title: The Beautiful Blonde from Bashful Bend

sources.title: The Beautiful Blonde from Bashful Bend (1949)
sources.description: Saloon-bar singer Freddie gets very angry whenever boyfriend Blackie seems to be playing around. She always packs a six-shooter, so this is bad news for anything that happens to be in the way. As this is usually the local judge's rear-end, Freddie and friend Conchita are soon hiding out teaching school in the middle of nowhere. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-beautiful-blonde-from-bashful-bend-1949/

metadata.Actors: Betty Grable, Cesar Romero, Rudy Vallee
